question: Which nation is the world's largest producer of "Cobalt" ore?
explanation: The Democratic Republic of Congo is the world's largest producer of cobalt. It accounts for more than 60% of global Cobalt production. However, the cobalt mining of the country has been linked to human right abuses including child labour. Tenke Fungurume is the biggest cobalt mine of the Democratic Republic of Congo, this mine holds one of the world's biggest copper and cobalt resources.
